sentences.english: He said the opposition was open to foreign troops training rebel fighters.
sentences.chinese: 他说起义军欢迎外国友军训练起义军的战士们。

sentences.english: There have been several previous fragging incidents in the Iraq war.
sentences.chinese: 在伊拉克战中中还有过几次类似的友军自袭事件。

sentences.english: Our forward position was recaptured with the aid of the friendly forces.
sentences.chinese: 在友军的帮助下，我们又夺回了前沿阵地。

sentences.english: A child shot in a friendly-fire incident?
sentences.chinese: 一名小孩受到友军枪击？

sentences.english: The FO can use this term to communicate to his platoon that a friendly artillery unit has begun firing.
sentences.chinese: 前沿观察员可用此术语通知其步兵排友军已开始炮击。

sentences.english: Affiliation describes if the event was of friendly or enemy nature.
sentences.chinese: 盟军一栏会描述这个事件是否有友军和环境因素。

sentences.english: Gerk roars to excite the friendly units and scare enemy units.
sentences.chinese: 葛克怒吼以激励友军单位并惊吓敌军单位。

sentences.english: Bestow the blessings of Nurgle on an allied unit.
sentences.chinese: 赋予友军单位纳垢的祝福。

sentences.english: The only thing more accurate than incoming enemy fire is incoming friendly fire.
sentences.chinese: 唯一比敌人火力还精确的是友军打过来的炮火。

sentences.english: It also allows the activation of a Glyph that increases allies' resistance to states.
sentences.chinese: 对雕文释放，增加站在雕文上的友军的异常状态抗性。

sentences.english: It therefore contributes to increased protection for friendly forces and the civilian population.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它有助于增加友军和平民的保护能力。

sentences.english: Sokolov: Oh yes. And without support from friendly units.
sentences.chinese: 是的，而且不需要友军的支持。

sentences.english: 22The only thing more accurate than incoming enemy fire is incoming friendly fire.
sentences.chinese: 22唯一比敌人火力还精确的是友军打过来的炮火。

definition: loose and disorganized soldiers/stragglers/fig. a loner
